Effect / Reminder Text: Destroy all units (Mechas and Towers). Each player discards their hand. Each player puts the top 5 cards of their deck into their graveyard.
Search you deck for 5 Towers, and place them on the battlefield. You can't play Towers for the rest of the game.
Attach this Command to one target Mecha you control in your entry zone. When that unit is destroyed, deal 2 damage to the Mecha that attacked it.
Cancel any one card. (When a player plays a card, you may play this card to prevent that from being played. That card is discarded.)
Return any one card from your discard pile to your hand.
